summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Alzheimer's AI Detection System. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate), frontend loads correctly with proper styling and API integration. Main issue identified: React Router configuration preventing access to registration and login pages.

backend_issues.notes: All backend tests passed successfully (9/9). API health, user registration, authentication, test sessions, cognitive tests, speech tests, reports, and progress tracking all working correctly.

routing_issues.issue: Routes /register and /login redirect to homepage instead of showing respective pages
routing_issues.impact: Users cannot access registration or login forms

functionality_issues.issue: Language selection doesn't change the interface language

passed_tests: Comprehensive form fields (email, name, age, education, vision status)
action_item_for_E1: Fix React Router configuration to enable proper navigation to /register and /login pages. The routing issue prevents users from accessing authentication forms. Also investigate i18n translation loading for language switcher functionality.
